name: Klaklak
description:
Silverlight portfolio site for the Edinburgh-based design and photography studio.

Here are some of the features:

  • Fully content managed (images, text, video, dynamic menus)
  • Deep linking (pages within the Silverlight app can be linked to directly)
  • Google content indexing (Google can crawl the site content and index it)
  • Google Sitemaps support (An easy way for Google to discover pages within the site)
  • Google Analytics support (Enables tracking of all Silverlight/Html page views)
  • Internationalisation - (Ability to add different language versions. The site remembers your preferred language when returning)
